review: It has transformed my normal LED tv to a rather smart tv, in fact I believe it is a lot more user friendly than the standards smart tvs that I have seen. the quality is great and you will really get the full hd. It is a really good device when you are playing YouTube videos. could be improved if it worked with other applications such as sky tv, bbc iplayer, itv player etc.
author: MR S TAGHABONI

review: Super easy to install. It took 2 minutes to set up.  It works great. I select movies on my phone,  and they play in great quality in my TV.
author: Franco B.

review: Eady to install and does a great job.  I would give it 5 stars if it worked with more apps.  Works well with the Chrome browser on my computer, but not compatible with the Chrome browser on my Samsung Tab 10.1. (tab 1).  You Tube works on the tablet, as does Netflix, but can't stream music already on my tablet.  Definitely recommend it, and as it's a Google product expect it to eventually have lots more apps.  Judt watched 7 hours of football streaming from my computer, flash crashed once but Chromcast worked well.
author: Sereneor "Sereneor"

review: Only Youtube is available in Europe and youcan share your laptop/desktop Chrome browser screen (this is not working from tablet or smartphone).But hope that in future Google will bring more functionality to it through firmware update of corse :)
author: Pavel

review: Excellent loving it's ease of use every day. Wish it would open up API for apps like plex from phone to stream
author: a.m

review: I used to watch Netflix using my desktop pc that is connected to my 60" television screen, but my desktop runs a little loud sometimes so that always bothered me.  You can't even hear chromecast so now I just use this and turn the desktop off.  It is awesome!Looking forward for future apps that will hopefully come out for this like Amazon Prime, fingers crossed.
author: Monda

review: I got this as a solution at a friends house. She had no cable but she did have cable internet, netflix account and movies on her pc. So with this we can watch videos and any videos on her pc with this device. As long as you have a good router the streaming will look great. And the way you get videos on your pc to play via chromecast simply right click the video and open it with the chrome browser cast it and there you are!!
author: Andrew Y

review: This is the best purchase I've made in a long time. it work on iPhone and computers. i love it.
author: Zack

review: Only works with three apps. Period.  Buy an Apple TV or Ruku. It is worth the extra money for 100 times the features. Bought the Chromecast at Best Buy and returned the next day. For $35 you definitely get what you pay for.
author: J.AX

review: If you watch a lot of streaming tv shows or movies, you need this. It is amazing. It is so nice to not have to sacrifice my computer if I want to watch shows on the tv. I can't help it, I'm a multitasker and I just like being able to browse the internet while watching a show. It was easy to set up and works really well, especially with netflix. I haven't quite figured out how to watch home movies with this thing yet (non-streaming movies that are just files on my computer), but with streaming stuff, it works very well. I could never go back to life without a chromecast.
author: AJ
